S02mekhdh_u:0_0: [MDh_114v2] namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisatvebhyaḥ evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavāṃ cchākyeṣu viharati sma /

S02mekhdh_u:1_0_1: utrāsito 'bhūt* atha rāhulaḥ kumāras tasya rātryā atyayena bahulaiḥ kumārakaiḥ parivṛtaḥ

S02mekhdh_u:2_1: brahmendrāś ca samāgataḥ maheśvaraś ca kumārāś cāpy ubhau samāgatau ye kecit kīrtitā bhūtā mekhalāya samāgata :
